# ```{r setup, include=FALSE}
# knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
# ```

Load the necessary library 
```{r message=FALSE, echo=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
```

Now load data into CSV file:
```{r}
naugad = read_csv(file = here::here("reanalysis_data","historicData_5020213.csv"))

```
Extract average monthly flow values from the reanalysis data:
```{r}
naugad_mnth_flw <-naugad %>% 
  mutate(Date = lubridate::dmy_hm(Dates)) %>%
  select(c(Date, Values)) %>% 
  mutate(year  = lubridate::year(Date),
         month = lubridate::month(Date),
         day   = lubridate::day(Date)) %>% 
  group_by (month) %>% 
  summarise(av_flow = mean(Values))

```

Save the average monthly flow values to a csv file:
```{r}
write_csv(naugad_mnth_flw, file = here::here("reanalysis_data", "reanlsis_mnthly_Naugad.csv"))
```
